rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Spacious, inviting entry with bohemian design elements and ample natural light. Designed for wheelchair accessibility with ramps and wide doorways.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space combining elements of Bohemian style with luxury finishes. Includes built-in seating areas, soft textures, and vibrant color accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; features a large table for gatherings and ambient lighting, ensuring Vastu compliance by orienting eastward.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, well-equipped kitchen with high-end appliances. Designed with accessible countertops and space for wheelchair maneuverability.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped, soundproofed gym area with state-of-the-art fitness equipment; designed with ample space for wheelchairs and smooth transitions.

openings.description: Accessible entrance door leading to the hallway.
Large window ensuring ample natural light and fresh air flow.
Sliding door for easy access between spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxury master suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed in a Bohemian style with rich textures and earth tones. Incorporates Vastu principles for bedroom placement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy room with bohemian decor; ample space for wheelchair accessibility including wider doorways and unobstructed layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for flexibility, incorporating Bohemian art elements and sufficient clearance for mobility aids.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Functional guest room with wheelchair accessible design; includes integrated seating and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library area featuring built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and natural lighting. Designed for quiet study and relaxation while adhering to Vastu guidelines of north or northeast orientation.

openings.description: Split-level staircase with a gentle incline, equipped with handrails for safe navigation.
Large window to ensure ample natural light and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Recreation Area / Game Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose recreational area with bohemian decor elements; designed for social gatherings, gaming sessions, or quiet relaxation. Fully accessible with barrier-free design.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Catering to household utilities and maintenance, designed for efficient space usage while remaining wheelchair friendly.

openings.description: Provides full vertical mobility from ground to upper floor ensuring accessibility.
Small window for additional natural lighting.
